name: react-native-fingerprint-scanner
description: React Native Fingerprint Scanner for Android and iOS
author: Hieu Van (https://github.com/hieuvp)

scripts.symlink: cd examples && rm -rf node_modules/react-native-fingerprint-scanner && npm link ../../react-native-fingerprint-scanner && rm -rf ../package-lock.json
scripts.cleanup: rm -rf android/build ios/build yarn.lock node_modules && cd examples && rm -rf android/build android/app/build ios/build yarn.lock node_modules
scripts.cleanup:install: yarn cleanup && yarn && cd examples && yarn && cd .. && yarn symlink && yarn cleanup:android
